product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Cube
long_description: Flying home with a damp swimsuit and dirty socks? No worries! Tuck 'em in the water-resistant side of the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Cube, away from dry, clean clothes in the other side. Main compartment compresses and carries either folded or rolled clothing; a thinner, lined water-resistant compartment isolates dirty or damp items. 2 sets of 2-way zippers make it easy to open and close either side when packed full. Made of washable, odor-resistant polyester with a mesh top so you can see what's inside. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Cube measures 14 x 10 x 4 in.
short_description: Flying home with a damp swimsuit and dirty socks? No worries! Tuck 'em in the water-resistant side of the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Cube, away from dry, clean clothes in the other side.
